meanings.definition: Not timely; happening or done at an inappropriate time.
meanings.sent1: Her untimeliness arrival caused the meeting to start late.
meanings.sent2: The train's untimeliness departure frustrated the passengers.
meanings.sent3: His untimeliness in responding to emails became a running joke in the office.
meanings.sent4: The untimeliness rain during the picnic dampened everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The untimeliness nature of his apology made it seem insincere.

meanings.definition: The quality of being late or delayed.
meanings.sent1: The untimeliness of the bus made her late for work.
meanings.sent2: He was frustrated by the untimeliness of the delivery.
meanings.sent3: The untimeliness of the cake at the party led to laughter among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The untimeliness of the sunset signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The untimeliness of the alarm clock caused him to oversleep.
